name: Celebrity VIP Lounge
tag_list: celebrity, gossip, entertainment, scandal, pictures, music, movies
overview:
Put away the hoo-hahs and the chest hair. At the Celebrity VIP Lounge, if you love gossip and can handle it delivered with a twist, you, my friend are always on the VIP list. Sit down, kick back, relax and be prepared for gossip delivered to you in the classiest and sassiest way possible.

The VIP Lounge has been created as a place for you, the visitor, to kick it with your VIP host, Danity Donnaly. As long as youâ€™ve got a pass and a good attitude, you are welcome to hang with the Midwestern mama and her fierce staff and fellow VIP guests. (And you just never know who will show upâ€¦) Visit different areas of the Lounge to be entertained in music, fashion, relationships, movies, and other happenings in the celebrity world.
